name: Space Mountain
theme: Blast through outer space on a high-speed journey through the cosmos with on-board audio.
short_description: A thrilling indoor roller coaster through the darkness of space.

name: Big Thunder Mountain
theme: Race through a haunted gold mine aboard a runaway mine train in the Old West.
short_description: A family-friendly roller coaster through a mining town in the American frontier.

name: Splash Mountain
theme: Follow Br'er Rabbit's adventure through the briar patch with a thrilling 5-story plunge finale.
short_description: A log flume ride through animated scenes culminating in a big splash drop.

name: Haunted Mansion
theme: Tour a mansion filled with 999 happy haunts in this classic spooky dark ride.
short_description: A ghostly tour through a haunted estate with playful spirits and special effects.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean
theme: Sail through pirate-infested waters featuring Audio-Animatronics buccaneers and treasure.
short_description: A boat ride through scenes of swashbuckling pirates and plundered towns.

name: Jungle Cruise: Wildlife Expeditions
theme: Explore exotic rivers of Asia, Africa, and South America guided by a humorous skipper.
short_description: A scenic boat tour through jungle environments with animatronic animals.

name: Pooh's Hunny Hunt
theme: A trackless dark ride through the Hundred Acre Wood where vehicles move independently and unpredictably.
short_description: An innovative trackless dark ride exclusive to Tokyo featuring Winnie the Pooh.

name: Enchanted Tale of Beauty and the Beast
theme: Experience Belle's story in a stunning trackless ride through the Beast's castle with dancing dishware.
short_description: A state-of-the-art trackless dark ride through Beauty and the Beast's enchanted world.

name: The Happy Ride with Baymax
theme: Spin and whip around unpredictably in vehicles designed by Baymax for maximum happiness.
short_description: A whimsical spinning ride featuring Big Hero 6's lovable healthcare companion.

name: Monsters, Inc. Ride & Go Seek!
theme: Help find monsters hidden in Monstropolis using flashlights in this interactive dark ride.
short_description: A unique interactive dark ride exclusive to Tokyo where guests find hiding monsters.

name: Buzz Lightyear's Astro Blasters
theme: Join Buzz Lightyear's mission to defeat Emperor Zurg by shooting targets with laser cannons.
short_description: An interactive shooting dark ride through space with competitive scoring.

name: Star Tours: The Adventures Continue
theme: A 3D flight simulator with randomized Star Wars adventures across the galaxy.
short_description: A motion simulator ride through iconic Star Wars locations with multiple story paths.

name: Peter Pan's Flight
theme: Fly over London and Neverland in a pirate galleon suspended from the ceiling.
short_description: A classic flying dark ride through the story of Peter Pan.

name: Snow White's Adventures
theme: Journey through the classic tale of Snow White with the Evil Queen and Seven Dwarfs.
short_description: A dark ride through the story of Snow White and the poisoned apple.

name: Pinocchio's Daring Journey
theme: Follow Pinocchio's journey from puppet to real boy through Pleasure Island and beyond.
short_description: A charming dark ride through the adventures of Pinocchio.

name: Alice's Tea Party
theme: Spin around in giant teacups at the Mad Hatter's unbirthday party.
short_description: A classic spinning teacup ride themed to Alice in Wonderland.

name: it's a small world
theme: A boat cruise celebrating world cultures with singing dolls and the iconic theme song.
short_description: A gentle boat ride through colorful scenes of children from around the world.

name: Dumbo the Flying Elephant
theme: Soar through the sky aboard Dumbo and control your flight height.
short_description: A classic flying elephant spinner ride for all ages.

name: Castle Carrousel
theme: A classic carousel with ornate horses in front of Cinderella Castle.
short_description: A beautiful antique-style carousel featuring hand-carved horses.

name: Western River Railroad
theme: Paddle around the Rivers of America through the wilderness on a Mark Twain-style riverboat.
short_description: A scenic steamboat cruise around the park's rivers.

name: Swiss Family Treehouse
theme: Explore the elaborate treehouse home of the Swiss Family Robinson shipwreck survivors.
short_description: A walk-through attraction in a massive artificial tree with multiple rooms.

name: Beaver Brothers Explorer Canoes
theme: Paddle a real canoe around the Rivers of America with your fellow guests.
short_description: A free-floating canoe experience where guests actually paddle.

name: Country Bear Theater
theme: A musical revue featuring singing Audio-Animatronic bears performing country and western songs.
short_description: A classic Audio-Animatronic stage show with charming bear performers.

name: Mark Twain Riverboat
theme: A relaxing voyage around the Rivers of America aboard an authentic sternwheeler steamboat.
short_description: A leisurely cruise on a majestic paddle wheeler steamboat.

name: Tom Sawyer Island Rafts
theme: Raft to a wilderness island with caves, bridges, and fort to explore at your own pace.
short_description: An interactive island playground accessible by raft with caves and trails.

name: Space Mountain (Updated)
theme: Experience Space Mountain reimagined with new effects and updated track technology.
short_description: A reimagined Space Mountain with enhanced technology (scheduled for 2027).

name: Stitch Encounter
theme: Have a live conversation with the mischievous alien Stitch via satellite.
short_description: An interactive show where guests chat with Stitch in real-time.

name: Tokyo Disneyland Electrical Parade Dreamlights
theme: A dazzling nighttime parade with millions of LED lights and Disney characters on elaborate floats.
short_description: Tokyo's signature nighttime electrical parade with stunning illuminated floats.

name: Disney Harmony in Color
theme: A colorful daytime parade celebrating the joy and harmony of Disney stories.
short_description: A vibrant daytime parade featuring Disney characters in spectacular costumes.

name: Sky Full of Colors
theme: A nighttime spectacular featuring fireworks, projections on Cinderella Castle, and Disney music.
short_description: Tokyo Disneyland's nighttime fireworks spectacular over the castle.

name: Club Mouse Beat
theme: A high-energy dance party hosted by Mickey and friends in a futuristic nightclub setting.
short_description: A live musical show featuring Disney characters in an electrifying dance club.
